00009 #ifndef _DXERR9_H_
00010 #define _DXERR9_H_
00011 
00012 #ifdef __cplusplus
00013 extern "C" {
00014 #endif //__cplusplus
00015 
00016 //
00017 //  DXGetErrorString9
00018 //  
00019 //  Desc:  Converts a DirectX 9 or earlier HRESULT to a string 
00020 //
00021 //  Args:  HRESULT hr   Can be any error code from
00022 //                      D3D9 D3DX9 D3D8 D3DX8 DDRAW DPLAY8 DMUSIC DSOUND DINPUT DSHOW
00023 //
00024 //  Return: Converted string 
00025 //
00026 const char*  WINAPI DXGetErrorString9A(HRESULT hr);
00027 const WCHAR* WINAPI DXGetErrorString9W(HRESULT hr);
00028 
00029 #ifdef UNICODE
00030 #define DXGetErrorString9 DXGetErrorString9W
00031 #else
00032 #define DXGetErrorString9 DXGetErrorString9A
00033 #endif 
00034 
00035 
00036 //
00037 //  DXGetErrorDescription9
00038 //  
00039 //  Desc:  Returns a string description of a DirectX 9 or earlier HRESULT
00040 //
00041 //  Args:  HRESULT hr   Can be any error code from
00042 //                      D3D9 D3DX9 D3D8 D3DX8 DDRAW DPLAY8 DMUSIC DSOUND DINPUT DSHOW 
00043 //
00044 //  Return: String description
00045 //
00046 const char*  WINAPI DXGetErrorDescription9A(HRESULT hr);
00047 const WCHAR* WINAPI DXGetErrorDescription9W(HRESULT hr);
00048 
00049 #ifdef UNICODE
00050     #define DXGetErrorDescription9 DXGetErrorDescription9W
00051 #else
00052     #define DXGetErrorDescription9 DXGetErrorDescription9A
00053 #endif 
00054 
00055 
00056 //
00057 //  DXTrace
00058 //
00059 //  Desc:  Outputs a formatted error message to the debug stream
00060 //
00061 //  Args:  CHAR* strFile   The current file, typically passed in using the 
00062 //                         __FILE__ macro.
00063 //         DWORD dwLine    The current line number, typically passed in using the 
00064 //                         __LINE__ macro.
00065 //         HRESULT hr      An HRESULT that will be traced to the debug stream.
00066 //         CHAR* strMsg    A string that will be traced to the debug stream (may be NULL)
00067 //         BOOL bPopMsgBox If TRUE, then a message box will popup also containing the passed info.
00068 //
00069 //  Return: The hr that was passed in.  
00070 //
00071 HRESULT WINAPI DXTraceA( const char* strFile, DWORD dwLine, HRESULT hr, const char* strMsg, BOOL bPopMsgBox );
00072 HRESULT WINAPI DXTraceW( const char* strFile, DWORD dwLine, HRESULT hr, const WCHAR* strMsg, BOOL bPopMsgBox );
00073 
00074 #ifdef UNICODE
00075 #define DXTrace DXTraceW
00076 #else
00077 #define DXTrace DXTraceA
00078 #endif 
00079 
00080 
00081 //
00082 // Helper macros
00083 //
00084 #if defined(DEBUG) | defined(_DEBUG)
00085 #define DXTRACE_MSG(str)              DXTrace( __FILE__, (DWORD)__LINE__, 0, str, FALSE )
00086 #define DXTRACE_ERR(str,hr)           DXTrace( __FILE__, (DWORD)__LINE__, hr, str, FALSE )
00087 #define DXTRACE_ERR_MSGBOX(str,hr)    DXTrace( __FILE__, (DWORD)__LINE__, hr, str, TRUE )
00088 #else
00089 #define DXTRACE_MSG(str)              (0L)
00090 #define DXTRACE_ERR(str,hr)           (hr)
00091 #define DXTRACE_ERR_MSGBOX(str,hr)    (hr)
00092 #endif
00093 
00094 
00095 #ifdef __cplusplus
00096 }
00097 #endif //__cplusplus
00098 
00099 #endif // _DXERR9_H_
